meanings.sent1: She likes to systematise her books by color.
meanings.sent2: He will systematise his schedule for the week.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to systematise its toys in a neat row.
meanings.sent4: The teacher systematised the students into groups for the project.
meanings.sent5: The chef systematised the ingredients before starting to cook.

meanings.definition: Organize according to a plan or system.
meanings.sent1: They systematise their tasks to finish them efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The team will systematise the project timeline.
meanings.sent3: The robots systematise the factory production line perfectly.
meanings.sent4: She systematised her thoughts before making a decision.
meanings.sent5: The manager systematised the workflow to improve productivity.
